item.description:
Reposting from Facebook:  http://www.facebook.com/event.php?eid=205996556118255

There was no local event for June -- we're overdue!

Come out and enjoy the summer with a drink and other like-minded, liberty-loving individuals. Please especially consider coming if you haven't made it out to one of our events yet. You won't regret it -- you'll make new friends, have a good time -- and you'll probably learn something new. :)

To locate our party, look for the red balloon. If that fails, try my phone (Chris), at 614-582-5901.

group.name: The Boston Area Libertarian Meetup Group

item.name: Liberty Drinks visits the Boston Harbor
